name: JUMPBALL (itch)
description:
Jumpball is an arcade style endless runner where you run as far as you can collecting medals and trophies while avoiding the baseballs.  Try to get as far as you can!

DEVELOPER'S NOTE

This is only version 0.2 of Jumpball.  The game is nowhere near what I want it to end up as, so please check back to see the new features of the new versions, and play them! 

If you decided to download the game, thank you so much!
